verses.verse: Usinipite, Mwokozi, unisikie; Unapozuru wengine, usinipite.
verses.refrain: Bwana, Bwana, unisikie Unapozuru wengine, usinipite.
verses.verse: Kiti chako cha rehema, nakitazama; Magoti napiga pale, nisamehewe.
Sina ya kutegemea, ila wewe tu; Uso wako uwe kwangu: nakuabudu.
Wewe tu u Mfariji: sina mbinguni, Wala duniani pote, Bwana mwingine.
